class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: This course focuses on business-to-business sales organizations, the essential elements that influence their effectiveness, and the latest changes impacting sales management practice. The course offers greater emphasis on management effectiveness than personal selling, though it does include a brief survey of various sales methodologies. Also considered is the emerging role of sales operations, a portfolio of productivity initiatives many firms now use to support sales force effectiveness.
prerequisites: MKT 340 or SPECSTUBUS students or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
